welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Al Malikiyah, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore all the wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport is reserved for military personnel and government officials.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bahrain International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal offers exclusive services for high-profile passengers and private jets.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Bahrain International Airport.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of King Abdulaziz AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
